trans-unit.source: Closes a previously opened file.

seg-source.mrk: Closes a previously opened file.

target.mrk: Closes a previously opened file.

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: The handle of a file, as returned by a previous call to FileOpen().

seg-source.mrk: The handle of a file, as returned by a previous call to FileOpen().

target.mrk: The handle of a file, as returned by a previous call to FileOpen().

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: 0 if the filehandle is invalid.

seg-source.mrk: 0 if the filehandle is invalid.

target.mrk: 0 if the filehandle is invalid.

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: Upon termination, AutoIt automatically closes any files it opened, but calling FileClose() is still a good idea.

seg-source.mrk: Upon termination, AutoIt automatically closes any files it opened, but calling FileClose() is still a good idea.

target.mrk: Upon termination, AutoIt automatically closes any files it opened, but calling FileClose() is still a good idea.

trans-unit.source: This function is also used to close search handles as returned by FileFindFirstFile().

seg-source.mrk: This function is also used to close search handles as returned by FileFindFirstFile().

target.mrk: This function is also used to close search handles as returned by FileFindFirstFile().
